name: WarpThrough DEMO
description:
WarpThrough is a game about warping through as many dimensions as you can, punching through all the monsters in your way.

However,

there's no punch button.

Master the art of 'Pause to punch' to fight off monsters, find out why they are invading your home,

and save your friends along the way.

____

This is the Demo for WarpThrough! It contains a single level and only one character, showcasing some of the core gameplay.

____

WarpThrough is created by Roofkat, an indie company founded by Ramon Huiskamp. You can follow progress on the game at fb.com/roofkatgames!
